definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
variant of 爛漫|烂漫[lan4 man4]

sentences.english: So Naaman went with his horses and chariots and stopped at the door of Elisha's house.

sentences.english: So Naaman came with his horses and with his chariot， and stood at the door of the house of Elisha.
sentences.chinese: 於是，乃縵帶着車馬到了以利沙的家，站在門前。

sentences.english: Naaman was the commander of the Syrian army.
sentences.chinese: 乃縵是亞蘭王軍隊的司令員。

sentences.english: We all understand that Chinese shippers are very popular in your market on account of their superior quality and competitive price.

sentences.english: Because of this miracle, Naaman had believed in the true and living God.
sentences.chinese: 因着這個神蹟，乃縵信了那位又真有活的神。

sentences.english: No Jesus says, he wasn't sent to them he was sent to Naaman the Syrian.
sentences.chinese: 不，耶穌說，他只去了敘利亞國的乃縵。

sentences.english: Naaman's leprosy will cling to you and to your descendants forever.'
sentences.chinese: 因此，乃縵的大麻瘋必沾染你和你的後裔，直到永遠。

sentences.english: The leprosy therefore of Naaman shall cleave unto thee， and unto thy seed for ever.
sentences.chinese: 因此，乃縵的大麻瘋必沾染你和你的後裔，直到永遠。

sentences.english: Then Naaman went to the Jordan River.

sentences.english: And Naaman said, Be content, take two talents.

sentences.english: For renewing precepts, please bring your own precept robe. Donation for precept robes (US$25) is welcome.
sentences.chinese: 復戒者請自備縵衣，歡迎隨喜贊助縵衣$25。

definition: to play the zither/classical variant of 彈琴|弹琴[tan2 qin2]
Daguan district of Anqing city 安慶市|安庆市[An1 qing4 shi4], Anhui
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
a sound/a noise/musical pipe with 3 reeds
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
